languages.text: {n}Лишь один голос прорезает воцарившуюся тишину:{/n} "Это — воля Лорд-капитана. Но усопший Леттард не назвал бы это правосудием".
{n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."
languages.original_text: {n}Лишь один голос прорезает воцарившуюся тишину:{/n} "Это — воля Лорд-капитана. Но усопший Леттард не назвал бы это правосудием".

traits.locale_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."
{n}A sole voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But it is not justice."
{n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But it is not justice."

{n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."

languages.text: {n}Une voix vient rompre le silence.{/n} « Telle est la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Mais le défunt, lui, n'y verrait certes pas la main de la justice. »
languages.original_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une voix vient rompre le silence.{/n} « Telle est la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Mais le défunt, lui, n'y verrait certes pas la main de la justice. »

languages.text: {n}Una voz solitaria atraviesa el silencio que se produce.{/n} «Es la voluntad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Pero el fallecido no lo llamaría justicia».
languages.original_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una voz solitaria atraviesa el silencio que se produce.{/n} «Es la voluntad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Pero el fallecido no lo llamaría justicia».

languages.text: {n}ひとつの声が長い静寂を切り裂いた。{/n}「それこそロード・キャプテンのご意志ですか。ですが、使者はこれを正義とは呼ばないでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}ひとつの声が長い静寂を切り裂いた。{/n}「それこそロード・キャプテンのご意志ですか。ですが、使者はこれを正義とは呼ばないでしょう」

languages.text: {n}某个声音打破了沉默。{/n}“这是舰长大人的旨意，但死者不会认为这是正义的裁决。”
languages.original_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}某个声音打破了沉默。{/n}“这是舰长大人的旨意，但死者不会认为这是正义的裁决。”

languages.text: {n}Eine Stimme durchschneidet die eingetretene Stille.{/n} "Das ist der Wille des Lord Captains. Aber der Verstorbene würde das nicht als Gerechtigkeit bezeichnen."
languages.original_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Stimme durchschneidet die eingetretene Stille.{/n} "Das ist der Wille des Lord Captains. Aber der Verstorbene würde das nicht als Gerechtigkeit bezeichnen."

languages.text: {n}Ardından gelen sükûnet, tek bir sesle kesiliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ın arzusu bu yönde olsa da rahmetli, bunu adalet olarak görmezdi."
languages.original_text: {n}A single voice cuts through the ensuing silence.{/n} "That is the Lord Captain's will. But the deceased would not call it justice."
